description: Episode of Series "The Researchers". It looks like any other suburban Australian house, but in fact it's a highly efficient laboratory built in Melbourne for the CSIRO. The purpose is to see how much fuel costs can be reduced by a combination of good insulation, efficient design and an innovative solar heating system.
